Package com.example.binarybandits.player

Class PlayerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.binarybandits.player.PlayerDB
  • public class PlayerDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores, retrieves, adds, and deletes Player data Outstanding issues: -It takes a noticeable amount of time to process results (about half a second)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayerDB​(DBConnector connector)
      Retrieve the database and the reference for the Players collection

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer​(Player player)
        Adds a new player to the Players collection in the database. A new player with a username already in the database is not added.
        Parameters:
        player - New player to add to the Players collection in the database

      • addOnSuccess

        public void addOnSuccess​(java.lang.String username,
                         Player player)
        If a username is available, add a player to the database
        Parameters:
        username - Requested username to associate with a new Player
        player - Player object to add to Players collection

      • getAllPlayers

        public void getAllPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> playerList,
                          PlayerListCallback callback)
        Get all Players currently in Players collection in the database
        Parameters:
        playerList - local copy of the list of Player to update
        callback - has method containing what to do with queried playerList

      • getPlayer

        public void getPlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                      PlayerCallback callback)
        Get a Player based on username
        Parameters:
        username - Current player's username

      • getPlayerHelper

        public java.util.ArrayList<QRCode> getPlayerHelper​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>> qrCodesScanned)
        Helper function for getPlayer that get a list of a Player's QRCodes
        Parameters:
        qrCodesScanned - An ArrayList to hold QRCode objects scanned by the Player
        Returns:
        Return a list of the Player's QR codes

      • getPlayersByQuery

        public void getPlayersByQuery​(com.google.firebase.firestore.Query query,
                              PlayerListCallback callback)
        Get players that satisfy an inputted query
        Parameters:
        query - Firebase Firestore query containing results to process
        callback - has method containing what to do with queried playerList

      • getSortedPlayers

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.Query getSortedPlayers()
        Get query containing sorted players by score
        Returns:
        Return the Query containing all players in database sorted by score

      • searchPlayer

        public com.google.firebase.firestore.Query searchPlayer​(java.lang.String input)
        Find all players with a username containing input
        Parameters:
        input - text to search for in Player usernames
        Returns:
        Query result of searching for a Player with a username matching input

      • updatePlayer

        public void updatePlayer​(Player player)
        Update a field in a Player document
        Parameters:
        player - Player to update
